You're looking for cult movies with a focus on horror or social commentary. Here are two recommendations:

1. 'The Evil Dead' (1981) - This classic splatter film, starring Betsy Baker and directed by Sam Raimi, serves as an entrypoint into the world of cult horror.

2. 'A Clockwork Orange' (1962) - Although not a typical horror movie, this dystopian sci-fi film, featuring Malcolm McDowell in the title role, explores themes of free will, violence, and rehabilitation through a cult classic lens.
